A BlazPay Wallet Extension for Your Browser

Secure your gateway to the blockchain world with the BlazPay wallet extension—whether you’re a seasoned blockchain enthusiast or a newcomer. BlazPay connects you to the decentralized web: a revolutionary version of the internet.

Trusted by users worldwide, our goal at BlazPay is to make the decentralized web accessible to everyone.

The BlazPay wallet extension empowers you to buy, send, spend, swap, and manage your digital assets effortlessly. Make payments globally, personalize your wallet with community-created features, and securely log into sites to trade, lend, borrow, engage in gaming, publish content, purchase unique digital art, and much more.

With BlazPay, you retain full control over your keys and assets:

	•	Utilize BlazPay’s key vault, secure login, and digital wallet to manage your assets.
	•	Create secure passwords and keys, ensuring your accounts remain protected.
	•	Explore and interact with decentralized websites.
	•	Decide how much information you share with websites, managing your privacy and data exposure.

Already a BlazPay user? Easily import your existing wallet. New to BlazPay? We’ll guide you through setting up and getting started!

Since BlazPay enhances your traditional browsing experience, it requires permission to read and write to any webpage. Feel free to review our source code just like any other Chrome extension on GitHub:
https://github.com/BlazPay

Discover more about our commitment to your privacy with our privacy policy: https://blazpay.com/privacy
